entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Repair causes fatal exception when you add the metadata file for MSI to a applocal file based installation #20096
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Concurrent workload commands uninstall each other #20094
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workload repair without any installed workloads should be a no-op #20092
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Consecutive installs should report installed workload #20085
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Native assets in nuget for net48 project are not copied to bin for ClassLibrary, but are copied for App #20073
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Incremental `dotnet test` #20071
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Consider removing comments in new templates #20062
    untriaged
  • SDK should not list test nupkgs in ItemsToSignPostBuild #20060
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • 'Dotnet tool restore' doesn't update toolResolverCache file #20043
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • ReadyToRun assemblies don't get strong name signed #20032
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun

Closed

  • WPF/Winforms fails to run. #19871
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Loc]With net6 rc1 installed on locale OS, warning description is unlocalized when runing "dotnet publish -r win-x64" in CLI. #19992
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • [Loc]With .NET 6 rc1 installed on locale OS, all strings are unlocalized when runing "dotnet workload..." in CLI. #19993
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Regression in .NET SDK 5.0.400: Can no longer publish WinForms/WPF app for win-arm64 (NETSDK1082) #19991
    untriaged
  • SDK build sporadically failing due to multiple pipelines trying to concurrently upload 'BlobArtifacts/dotnet-toolset-internal-6.0.100-ci.zip' #19679
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Evaluate windows arm with WPF and cswinrt #12413
    5.0.2xx
  • An error message appeared when building the core project after changed the Target Framework from .NET Core 3.1 to .NET 5.0 #13179
    5.0.2xx
  • Targeting .NET Framework for a WPF application using Microsoft.Net.Sdk does not work #13939
    5.0.2xx
  • Check 'signing' when building #8551
    Infrastructure, build, 3.1.1xx
  • Handle msbuild/IDE <-> sdk compatibility better in sdk resolver #8251
    Resolver
  • dotnet commands that do an implicit restore don't support --interactive flag #9774
    2.1.5xx
  • SDK nuget packages should be marked as non-shipping in 2.1.3xx #2328
    Area-Infrastructure, 2.1.6xx
  • PackageValidation CP0002 errors because of dropped assets #20044
    untriaged, Area-Compatibility
  • The console window displays garbled characters when type "dotnet --info" #19996
    untriaged
  • The target framework for Winforms VB .Net Core app is displayed '.Net 5.0 ' when creating app with choosing '.Net 6.0 (Preview)' #14943
    6.0.1xx
  • Preview 7 UX for Arm64/x64 co-existence on macOS #19743
    Area-External, Team:Runtime, Discussion

Updated

  • Bring back the option to use old templates (non-top level statements style) (changed in .NET Preview 7) #19672
    Area-External, Area-ImplicitUsings, Discussion
  • BlazorAOT workload installation not working #19798
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Inconsistencies between SDK and non-SDK ResolvePackageAssets #19318
    Area-NetSDK, Backlog
  • Workload commands failing after installing VS2022 Preview 3 and .NET 6 Preview 7 #19671
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Targeting net5 using net6 SDK causes pack failure #19665
    Area-External, untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Preview7 publish does not include compiled typescript output in static web assets #19692
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK, Area-AspNetCore
  • Solution build running for 18 min. after upgrade to Visual Studio 2022 17.0.0 Preview 3.0 and SDK 6.0.100-preview.7.21379.14 #19695
    Area-External
  • dotnet 5.0.400 build stops after GetCopyToPublishDirectoryItems step on macOS #19656
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • New/Empty Blazor Server Project from template doesn't compile (.Net 6 preview 7) #19652
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Could we add support for `dotnet tool update -g -all` #19650
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • net 6.0 throws NETSDK1005 error during build/publish via cmd as it does not accept the property "TargetFramework(s)" #19628
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Upgraded to .net 6 Preview 7 and workload commands are failing #19670
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Version conflict during compilation #20048
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • .NET SDK 5.0.400 not available for Ubuntu 18.04 #19983
    untriaged, Area-Linux
  • Run "dotnet --info" on Win11,the RID shown "win10-x64" #19926
    untriaged
  • `dotnet new android` attempts to restore Microsoft.AspNetCore.App.Runtime.linux-arm64 #19891
    Area-External, untriaged
  • `error MC1000: Unknown build error` when using reference assembly and XAML #19884
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Static Web Assets build error with .net 6 preview 7 #20008
    untriaged
  • Unable to reference Net5.0 C# project from Net5.0 C++ project #20002
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • DOTNETSDK_WORKLOAD_MANIFEST_ROOTS pointing to workloads that are not lowercased fails #19994
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Turn wpf vb template tests back #3678
  • SDK doesn't restore WPF design-time projects properly #13149
    needs team triage
  • Eliminate CallTarget usage from VSTest targets #13927
    Area-DotNet Test
  • MicrosoftNETPlatformLibrary property for Microsoft.AspNetCore.App fails with NRE for .NET Core 3.0 #10470
    needs team triage
  • [Component Licensing] SDK needs to make sure that licenses.licx ends up as "EmbeddedResource" #3631
    Feature Request, needs team triage
  • Runtime identifier is not forwarded when publishing exe project references (self-contained mode) #16184
    needs team triage, Area-NetSDK
  • MSBuild SDK resolver error messages are not localized #9538
    Resolver
  • Update implicit global usings feature to address issues #19521
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK, 6.0.1xx
  • dotnet restore -s is not working #12256
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #sdk-102550-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #19859
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102548-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #19861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #sdk-103310-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #19981
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime #20097
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #20095
    Area-External

    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #20091
    Area-External

    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Avoid signing and generating unnecessary packages #20080
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Only show VS workload list header on windows #20063
    Area-Workloads
  • [main] Update dependencies from mono/linker #20055
    Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update dependencies from dotnet/aspnetcore #20084
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Reduce the number of middlewares that dotnet-watch adds by default (#… #20079
